Demos

Demo: Start a conference in your browser by just sharing a link getaroom.io uses Temasys SkylinkJS and React to make a simple browser based conferencing solution with audio and video support. Check out the code and make it your own.

View Code Try it

Tutorial: Share your screen with other participants during a conference call Just one additional line of code is required to enable screensharing via WebRTC during your Temasys Skylink session. Check out how you use skylink.shareScreen() yourself.

View Tutorial

Demo: A web component to embed 1-on-1 calling into your website With just one HTML tag you can enable your website users to call each other with audio and video. See how it's done with Temasys SkylinkJS.

View Code

Demo: A simple audiovisual coworking chat for remote teams Build with just Temasys SkylinkJS, you can talk to and collaborate with your remote team in this simple yet powerful virtual co-working call.

View Code Try it

Demo: Syncronize the state of React components between multiple devices This React Mixin built with Temasys SkylinkJS syncs up the state of your React components with two added lines of code. Use it in collaboration apps or for remote product demos.

View Code

Demo: Selfie Dashboard - Trigger a photo on your Android phone Using the Temasys SkylinkJS data-channel you can send a captured JPEG to another device on the same WiFi. Perfect to take selfies using a selfie-stick ;)

View Code

Tutorial: Build a simple peer-to-peer web chat using Temasys SkylinkJS messaging Learn how to use the fast peer-to-peer messaging functionality built into Temasys SkylinkJS by implementing a simple web chat in four easy steps.
